body.p: In developing the 2018 Conceptual Framework, the Board concluded that accounting requirements for derecognition should aim to faithfully represent both:

li.p: any assets and liabilities retained after the transaction or other event that led to the derecognition (including any asset or liability acquired, incurred or created as part of the transaction or other event); and
the change in the entity’s assets and liabilities as a result of that transaction or other event.
